Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.serializer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISerializer<T>
    A Serializer must be able to convert from a String to an object of type T and vice-versa
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GsonEventSerializer
    Serializes and deserializes extensions of AbstractEvent, transforming them from/to JSON Events must be in the EVENTS_PACKAGE
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SerializationException
    An exception that represent an error during serialization or deserialization Deserialization errors are caused by invalid serialized strings
